title: "Fixed a number of bugs where various short-range dash abilities..."

replies.body: Pretty curious to see how much this does or doesn't affect J4, Anivia and Trundle's performance (not expecting too much on Taliyah given she creates terrain much less often). Suspect it's pretty minor in the bigger scheme of things, could be pretty significant in certain circumstances though (attempted Vayne dunking as J4 especially).
I don't get the vayne part. Does this mean she can't roll out of it or that she can't stun him on his wall?
She can't roll out of J4's ult! <3
Can she stun him on his own wall
Sion can jump over walls?  that would be funny as all.  J4 ult .. Sion ult out of J4 ult. duex

Tbh, J4 doesn't have enough to go top/jungle unless a lot of champions get near-gutted. 

He's more likely to make appearances as a mid-lane assassin (too unreliable), or support (risky, much like Alistar)

I don't see it pushing him up much unless top lane somehow becomes only good match-ups for him.

Will Bard's portal ever work on this terrain? I've died many a time to an encroaching Anivia or J4, and found myself questioning why I can't take a trip through these walls.
Is it because such a feature would completely gut the purpose of the walls, with everyone being able to escape through the portal to safety and all?

Fucking YES!!!

Fuck these vaynes getting out of my 60 second cd ult with a 2 second cd q
honestly i fking despise jarvan, but im happy for him, it's a glorious day to be a j4 faithful. cheers

still. the most saddening thing for me when i play anivia is seeing myself place that perfect wall, only to have vayne tumble over it and proceed to destroy me ;-;
rip dreams of living
